title: Scheduled Maintenance - Patch 5.9 - 15/05/2015
body:
Summoners,

On 15/05/15, starting at 02:30 Sydney Time (16:30 UTC), ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 5.9. At 04:00 Sydney Time (18:00 UTC), the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded.

We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 3 hours.

-ToxicHawk

replies.body: So I've looked in the news for the patch notes (for multiple servers) and there's no 5.9 patch notes. When can we expect to see it?

http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-59-notes

hint: patch notes are released with the patch. Patches are released at night or in times of low presence. Night happens at different times in the world. -> patchnotes are where the night is! :P

You realise that link is kind of pointless considering the patch notes are also on OCE, right?

Also, and I'm just going to assume you didn't read my post properly, I did state I checked other servers websites for the patch notes.
I managed to find this though http://www.newsoflegends.com/index.php/pbe-round-up-patch-5-9-38348/
are you fixing the servers too? or are you just letting them decay and rot.
